name: Stolen (itch)
description:
You were exploring an abandoned mannequin factory when you suddenly pass out. The next thing you know, you wake up in a random maze. Find the door, get out, and hurry. They're coming for you.

___________________________________________________________________________________

Hey everyone! This is one of the first game's I've ever made, so please let me know how it's running and if you like it! 

___________________________________________________________________________________

Code for project was obtained from multiple sources so I do not claim the code as my own! 

Also,
